summary: This is an email from Craig Hunter to an SDNY prosecutor (likely Audrey Strauss) praising the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell and expressing concern about unequal application of the law. The email emphasizes the importance of uniform law enforcement regardless of wealth or connections.

persons.name: Craig Hunter
persons.context: Writes an email to a prosecutor applauding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell and expressing concerns about unequal justice.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the email; her arrest is applauded, and the author notes she has powerful friends.

persons.name: Ms. Strauss
persons.context: Recipient of the email; thanked for her fight and sacrifice to maintain the integrity of the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Hunter sends an email to Strauss praising her work and the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.
Strauss, as a prosecutor, is involved in the arrest and legal proceedings against Maxwell.

events.title: Email praising Maxwell's arrest
events.description: Craig Hunter sends an email to prosecutor Ms. Strauss applauding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell and discussing concerns about unequal justice.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest
events.description: The email references the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell, which is the subject of the correspondence.

keyFacts: Craig Hunter sent an email on July 2, 2020, praising the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email expresses concern that powerful individuals with money or connections might avoid legal consequences, undermining the rule of law.
The recipient, Ms. Strauss, is thanked for her work to uphold the rule of law and maintain the integrity of the Southern District of New York.
The document highlights public support for the prosecution of Maxwell and concerns about equal justice.
The email is part of the Epstein case document set, indicating public correspondence related to the case.
